Name: Barrier Battery
Passive: Generate 3E per turn + 1E when activating a Shield.

Name: Chaotic Battery
Activate: Generate 4E. Players who rolled same letter as you on the last BINGO roll gain 1E, same number lose 1E.

Name: Military Battery
Passive: Generate 3E per turn + 1E when activating a Lazor.

Name: Tesseract Battery
Passive: No supply. Starts with 16E. Cannot be activated.
Activate: Spend 8E to make an extra BINGO roll.
